CustomField.formula:
IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'find contact'),'Find Contact', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'qualification + pitch'),'Qualification + Pitch', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'services + quality intro'),'Services + Quality Intro', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'bo + kycs'),'BO + KYCs', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'quality test feedback'),'Quality Test Feedback', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'payments + invoicing + services'),'Payments + Invoicing + Services', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'bo + product creation + quality or buybox'),'BO + Product Creation + Quality or Buybox', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'go live'),'Go Live', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'sales + products'),'Sales + Products', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'market/industry data'),'Market/Industry Data', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'quality dashboard'),'Quality Dashboard', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'services + shipping'),'Services + Shipping', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'intro to qam'),'Intro to QAM', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'n.m.o phase 2'),'N.M.O Phase 2', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'support│business'),'Support|Business', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'support|catalogue'),'Support|Catalogue', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'support|quality'),'Support|Quality', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'support|services'),'Support|Services', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'support|finance'),'Support|Finance', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'support|technical'),'Support|Technical', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'no answer'),'No Answer', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'voicemail'),'Voicemail', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'not available'),'Not available', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'request call back'),'Request Call back', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'request email'),'Request Email', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'no answer'),'No Answer', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'nmo│run'),'NMO│Run', IF(CONTAINS(LOWER(CallDisposition), 'nmo│exit'),'NMO│Exit',
'No Tag' ))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Aircall Tag
